pkgmetadata.longdescription: Description-----------This package allows interactive spreadsheet-style tables to be added into a Tkinter application.Tkinter is the standard GUI toolkit for Python. A sample application using these classesis included in the distribution. Now works with Python 3. A sample application using these classes is included in the distribution.Installation------------From pypi:: pip install tkintertableFrom github:: pip install -e git+https://github.com/dmnfarrell/tkintertable.git#egg=tkintertableYou can clone the current source using:: git clone https://github.com/dmnfarrell/tkintertable.gitUsage-----Import:: from tkintertable import TableCanvas, TableModelCreate table:: tframe = Frame(master) tframe.pack() table = TableCanvas(tframe) table.show() Constructor options:: table = TableCanvas(frame, model,cellwidth=60, cellbackgr='#e3f698',thefont=('Arial',12),rowheight=18, rowheaderwidth=30,rowselectedcolor='yellow', editable=True)Links-----See https://github.com/dmnfarrell/tkintertable/wiki for help.
